title: Riot needs to stop kissing Yasuo's ass
body:
Without a doubt one of the most overused champion in promotional material.

Odyssey trailer/cinematic
https://thumbs.gfycat.com/ScaryTemptingAsiandamselfly-max-1mb.gif

RISE music video
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DoFU5GwVAAA55Xe.jpg

'The Climb' cinematic
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/dm5PYopJA5o/maxresdefault.jpg

Season 2016 login theme
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lu0fUb0PGh4

VS. 2017 login theme
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W2nNTmampaI

LoL homepage
https://i.ibb.co/LJhMwkb/Screenshot-5.png

Season 2019 Login theme
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iV8OAXlWKw0

'Awaken' cinematic
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zF5Ddo9JdpY

**stop it. get some help**

replies.body: It sells well

> [{quoted}](name=Krayzie,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=r9k2gfTV,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-21T13:36:54.797+0000)
>
> It sells well

Let's be honest. He does have a nice butt.

#nohomo
   Yup he does

> [{quoted}](name=MF is my Waifu,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=r9k2gfTV,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-01-21T13:38:18.708+0000)
>
> Let's be honest. He does have a nice butt.

https://i.imgur.com/0QSmqjD.jpg/img
I'm a simple man. I see Darkest Dungeon, I upvote
He is a popular champion so they of course will shove him everywhere possible.

They need to start kissing some Lissandra ass, Poor girl hasnt been in one REAL cinematic... :(
Im glad camille got one tho, she looked like she is running this place :D
Riot seems to be marketing lissandra on the mystery market, she doesnt even have a single story from her perspective unlike everyone else who got a lore update.
Was Xerath ever present too? Not his attacks, **Xerath**

> [{quoted}](name=nerf ryze more,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=r9k2gfTV,comment-id=00020003,timestamp=2019-01-21T22:01:25.568+0000)
>
> Was Xerath ever present too? Not his attacks, **Xerath**

As a xerath main that has been playing against riven/irelia/yasuo all season this trailer is honestly depressing. I'm honestly surprised they didn't include zed or akali for good measure.

Feels like riot is heavily promoting annoying flashy champions that are unfun to play against by design. At least the jhin part was cool.

Ditto, but a business is a business :(
But yeah, atleast the part with jhin and camille saved it for me. I dont think i can ever get tired of Jhin in cinematics, because he is always so eleganté
didn't xerath have his own game mode being ascension? that's pretty big.
If they start kissing Lissandra's ass, then wouldn't their mouths get stuck to it? Personally, I say it be worth it.

> [{quoted}](name=The Iceborn,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=r9k2gfTV,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-01-21T13:40:18.537+0000)
>
> They need to start kissing some Lissandra ass, Poor girl hasnt been in one REAL cinematic... :(
> Im glad camille got one tho, she looked like she is running this place :D

No but seriously a lil promo cinematic with Lissandra's fuckin spooky ass emerging from a fog just gliding on ice shards with the Frostguard behind her?

God damn...
"How dare Riot use one of their coolest and most popular champions to hype things up!"

> [{quoted}](name=DuskDaUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=r9k2gfTV,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-01-21T14:12:54.329+0000)
>
> "coolest"

He's literally a man with a sword.

Riven is a woman with a sword. 
Katarina is a woman with Daggers.
Leblanc is a woman with a staff.
Xin Zhao is a man with a spear. 


I fail to see your point here.

She's literally a woman with a totem.

Jokes aside, I hope you can see how reducing a character to gender and weapon while ignoring everything else is not a good argument.

> [{quoted}](name=Tentakill Illaoi,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=r9k2gfTV,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2019-01-21T14:18:29.176+0000)
>
> He's literally a man with a sword.

Jax is man with a lamp!

> [{quoted}](name=DuskDaUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=r9k2gfTV,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-01-21T14:12:54.329+0000)
>
> "How dare Riot use one of their coolest and most popular champions to hype things up!"

Cool is subjective. Pretty boring all things considered when you realized the type of people he's surrounded by in game.

Taste are subjective, many people are attracted to the idea of wanderer reflecting on his past mistake and having taste the sour part of life to the point he try to understand what is his own path. His interaction with Taliyah show that he has some depth as a person and I know many person like to cry about the story of Riven and Yasuo but they make sense in a way by the fact they had a similar path.

Yeah Yasuo is a bit over used recently.

I can also see why, his figure and combat style are pretty scenic and hyping, anyway they need to show us some underexposed champions too.

> [{quoted}](name=Stars Shaper,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=r9k2gfTV,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-01-21T13:41:17.321+0000)
>
> Yeah Yasuo is a bit over used recently.
> 
> I can also see why, his figure and combat style are pretty scenic and hyping, anyway they need to show us some underexposed champions too.

Compared to other champions like {{champion:420}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:516}} who are more theatrically appealing, Yasuo is just another action-styled fighter/ninja. (Especially in the eyes of someone who has never played LoL before)

He has a good conjuction of flashy magic and martial style.

The colossal "ME SHAMSH YOU!" is surely appealing too (hence why Sion was in it and Nautilus in a past one) but once again, the art team has to choose and they are doing so with a lot of bias.
I've given up all hope of ever seeing {{champion:62}} in a video at this point...

Since when do you NOT use one of your postchild in promotion material?

He is ultra popular in asia too no? Of course you gonna show Yasuo.

Why don't you say that about Jinx then? Girl is in tons of stuff too...
At least jinx apeals to more personalities other than 'iM sO eDgY aNd dAsH vErY qUiCk'.
isnt jinx literally "im so edgy i have a bazooka"?

I would love seeing this champions in action : 

{{champion:50}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:143}}
Yeah I wanna see Evelyn in a cinematic, though Zyra already has one. What I really want to see though is my crab daddy {{champion:6}}
I'm kind of sad they don't often use the less human champions like Rek'sai and Bard

> [{quoted}](name=Tentakill Illaoi,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=r9k2gfTV,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-01-21T13:35:46.303+0000)
>
> Without a doubt one of the most overused champion in promotional material.
> 
> Odyssey trailer/cinematic
> https://thumbs.gfycat.com/ScaryTemptingAsiandamselfly-max-1mb.gif
> 
> RISE music video
> https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DoFU5GwVAAA55Xe.jpg
> 
> 'The Climb' cinematic
> https://i.ytimg.com/vi/dm5PYopJA5o/maxresdefault.jpg
> 
> Season 2016 login theme
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lu0fUb0PGh4
> 
> VS. 2017 login theme
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W2nNTmampaI
> 
> LoL homepage
> https://i.ibb.co/LJhMwkb/Screenshot-5.png
> 
> Season 2019 Login theme
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iV8OAXlWKw0
> 
> 'Awaken' cinematic
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zF5Ddo9JdpY
> 
> **stop it. get some help**

Stupidest Yasuo hate post i’ve seen in a while. Let’s not use the most popular champions in our advertisement, let’s use our least cause that’s how marketing works. Derp de derp

> [{quoted}](name=Bultz,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=r9k2gfTV,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2019-01-21T15:33:45.982+0000)
>
> Stupidest Yasuo hate post i’ve seen in a while. Let’s not use the most popular champions in our advertisement, let’s use our least cause that’s how marketing works. Derp de derp

I have to laugh, the whole point of these promos is to attract new players. Featuring Yasuo (aka sword edgelord) instead of actually interesting champions does nothing but grows all the Yasuo mains' e-boner, because he's probably one of the plainest champions.

TL;DR There's no point in overusing Yasuo in promos just because he's popular amongst the players because new players have no idea who he is nor acknowledge his popularity in the first place.

> [{quoted}](name=Tentakill Illaoi,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=r9k2gfTV,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2019-01-21T15:43:16.036+0000)
>
> I have to laugh, the whole point of these promos is to attract new players. Featuring Yasuo (aka sword edgelord) instead of actually interesting champions does nothing but grows all the Yasuo mains' e-boner, because he's probably one of the plainest champions.
> 
> TL;DR There's no point in overusing Yasuo in promos just because he's popular amongst the players because new players have no idea who he is nor acknowledge his popularity in the first place.

I have to laugh because you think your opinion is fact. "actually interesting champion" lmao Yasuo is the most popular champion overall and with new players. His play rate is the highest, his skin sales are the highest. His player base is the most devoted in the game. lmao but sure your opinion is what matters... They show him because everyone loves the concept. Because as sure as I am about new player not wanting to play some masculine tentacle woman, I'm sure a samurai who controls wind is far more interesting.

> [{quoted}](name=Bultz,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=r9k2gfTV,comment-id=000d00000000,timestamp=2019-01-21T16:07:50.402+0000)
>
> I have to laugh because you think your opinion is fact. "actually interesting champion" lmao Yasuo is the most popular champion overall and with new players. His play rate is the highest, his skin sales are the highest. His player base is the most devoted in the game. lmao but sure your opinion is what matters... They show him because everyone loves the concept. Because as sure as I am about new player not wanting to play some masculine tentacle woman, I'm sure a samurai who controls wind is far more interesting.

Yasuo is an absolute commercial success, because his creation was solely made for attracting the edgy weeb teenagers.

As a character Yasuo has nothing much special about him really, theres countless names of the "asian" edgelord samurai stereotype in video games and pop culture in general. Riot made a great job, because they knew how to appease the masses.

Whether you like the champion or not, you can't deny the fact that Yasuo is more appealing to prebubescent kids, in fact I'm sure a lot of them are still in college and are yet playing Fortnite from time to time.

Because he is the most popular champion in The game?
I see no problem  , I'd do the same if I was a Rioter
Ahri and Ryze are way more iconic League of Legends champions though. Yasuo is kind of a new champion, old school League champions would deserve more attention in cinematics IMO.

>Yasuo is kind of a new champion

it's been 4 years.

I think I've banned Yasuo more than any other champion, yet I'm sure I've still played against him more times than a lot of champions (I don't ban him every single game).

It's kinda crazy.
